sources.title: The Beloved Vagabond
sources.description: Maurice Chevalier stars as a poor aspiring architect who signs an agreement not to see his fianc√©e for two years, in order to save her father from financial ruin.

metadata.Plot: In London at the turn of the century, Gaston du Nerac is due to marry his fiancee, Joanna. When her father finds himself in financial trouble, Gaston reluctantly accepts help from a rival - on condition that he never sees Joanna again.
metadata.Writer: William J. Locke, Arthur Wimperis, Walter Creighton
metadata.Actors: Maurice Chevalier, Betty Stockfeld, Margaret Lockwood
